backend/main.mo: Defines core workout, exercise, recovery, profile, and error types along with a built‑in exercise library and test recovery flag.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report placeholder with an empty features array.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Contains prewritten summaries for frontend files describing styling, components, hooks, pages, and logic details.
frontend/DEPLOY_RETRY.md: Deployment retry log documenting manual deploy triggers and a backend leg-filter fix.
frontend/index.html: PWA‑enabled HTML entry file including meta tags, manifest links, touch icons, splash screens, and root mounting container.
frontend/public/manifest.json: PWA manifest defining app metadata, icons, colors, and display settings for Gym Tracker.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Main React application controlling authentication flow, routing, splash screen, and workout validation before navigation.
Modal for logging and updating bodyweight with validation, unit selection, and profile update mutation.
frontend/src/components/BottomNav.tsx: Bottom navigation bar with vibrational feedback, page switching, and integrated settings modal.
frontend/src/components/ExerciseChangeMo: Modal to fetch and display alternative exercises, allowing users to select and record an exercise change.
frontend/src/components/Header.tsx: Top navigation bar showing app title, test mode badge, settings button, and logout functionality.
frontend/src/components/ProfileLoadingSc: Empty component file with no implemented UI or logic.
frontend/src/components/PullToRefresh.ts: Implements custom pull-to-refresh behavior with touch handling and a rotating refresh indicator.
Displays muscle recovery status with color codes, badges, loading skeletons, and optional weighted leg recovery.
frontend/src/components/SettingsModal.ts: Modal for editing and saving user profile settings like gender, weight, frequency, dark mode, and rest intervals.
frontend/src/components/SplashScreen.tsx: Full‑screen splash screen showing app branding with animated dumbbell icon and text.
frontend/src/components/StatusBar.tsx: Sticky status bar showing current streak count and today's date.
frontend/src/components/WorkoutShareModa: Modal that generates a QR code and link for sharing a workout, with copy and native share options.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Provides a hook that creates and manages a backend actor tied to the current Internet Identity, invalidating dependent queries when the actor changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Implements an Internet Identity provider and hook for managing authentication state, loading identities, and handling login/logout via AuthClient.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Defines React Query hooks and utilities for backend data fetching, error handling, validation, and workout-related operations.
frontend/src/hooks/useWakeLock.ts: Provides a hook for managing the Screen Wake Lock API with automatic reacquisition, error handling, and visibility-based behavior.
frontend/src/index.css: Global Tailwind CSS file enforcing dark mode, theming variables, mobile optimizations, and system-style UI behaviors.
frontend/src/lib/sessionStorage.ts: Utility functions to save, load, validate, and clear workout session state in sessionStorage.
frontend/src/lib/timestampUtils.ts: Utility functions for converting, validating, and formatting backend BigInt timestamps into usable dates and strings.
Groups exercises by muscle group, orders them by a fixed sequence, and builds structured sections with leg subsections and alphabetical fallback groups.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Initializes React root and wraps the app with React Query and Internet Identity providers.
frontend/src/pages/DashboardPage.tsx: Displays workout history, recovery data, streaks, and refresh actions with lazy‑loaded components and timestamp handling.
frontend/src/pages/HistoryPage.tsx: Shows past workouts with date formatting, a calendar view, and pull‑to‑refresh using validated timestamp conversion.
frontend/src/pages/LoginPage.tsx: Renders the login screen featuring Internet Identity authentication and themed UI elements.
frontend/src/pages/NewWorkoutPage.tsx: Lets users generate full, upper, or lower‑body workouts via query hooks and handle workflow navigation.
frontend/src/pages/OnboardingPage.tsx: Collects and validates initial user profile data before saving it through a mutation hook.
frontend/src/pages/ProgressPage.tsx: Displays recovery state and weekly muscle group volume with refresh support and styled UI cards.
frontend/src/pages/SharedWorkoutPage.tsx: Empty page placeholder with no implemented content.
frontend/src/pages/WorkoutPreviewPage.ts: Validates and previews a generated workout, supports regenerating exercises and swapping individual exercises.
frontend/src/pages/WorkoutSessionPage.ts: Handles live workout execution including set logging, timers, PR detection, exercise changes, and session persistence.
frontend/src/types.ts: Defines frontend-only TypeScript types for exercises, workouts, recovery state, and related data structures.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Utility functions for reading, persisting, and clearing URL parameters using query strings, hash routing, and sessionStorage.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind CSS configuration extending colors, typography, animations, and responsive settings.
project_state.json: Metadata describing project state, issues, and a required backend fix for muscle group filtering.
